post.body: Andrew Becker was just in my office. I was telling him I'm a fan of TRS.
I know it looked like it but I wasn't asking. See you at the party. I'll be the guy dressed like an Islands employee.
Bah! They cancelled our Christmas party because of the recession. Can I crash yours?
Emailed
I know Andrew. I was helping him with his reel a few weeks ago. He's great. I've probably met your brother and didn't know it.
I do. I'm the IT/enginner but for that project, I did visual effects. Doesn't your brother work at a post company near outpost?
I did the visual effects on that doc. : )
I woke up at 7:30 and went back to sleep for an hour. In that time, I dreamt I was in a vivid scary zombie apocalypse for 3 days.
Ohhhh new Terminator Salvation trailer. Me likey. http://www.majorspoilers.com/archives/8854.htm/
I'm walking on sunshine.
$450 for transmission repairs plus 100 for labor. Sigh...
I spent 250 bucks on my car before 10 AM this morning. Thanks Ford.
This fridge has been sitting outside my apartment for 4 days. Whoever left it must think magic will make it vanish. http://twitpic.com/q7yq
New Ghostbusters trailer and it looks AWESOME! http://tinyurl.com/5blxf3
I don't know what to do with all the extra time on my hands. Oh right...Warcraft.
Did anyone watch the Britney documentary last night? I feel like I've seen it before.....
My review of Twilight: Buffy did it better.
First movie I've seen since Dark Knight and it's.....Twilight?
Amazed that I'm not actually at work today.
Enjoying turkey...at work. Wait how did that happen?!
Getting drinks at Busby's.
The Soup makes fun of the Britney documentary I worked on: http://www.facebook.com/v/54570170859
I forgot today was my birthday. Thanks, facebook, for helping me remember.
Hanging out with the neighbors.
Playstation Home is pretty rad but I don't like how it's micro transaction based. You should be able to get things based on how you play.
Watching Valkyrie.
Merry Consumermas
Dexter season 2 = teh awesomes
I spent a whole day doing pc tech support, grinding my teeth, knowing I could be doing the same stuff on a mac in less than an hour. Sigh.
Somehow I got suckered into going to Rhode Island with my dad.
Nice....they finally fixed my IMdB credits... http://www.imdb.com/name/nm2190134/
Having brunch with the folks in New Haven. Here's the view. http://twitpic.com/uz9r
Watching Weeds and enjoing the hell out of it.
Having lunch at Johnny Rocket's with my dad. http://twitpic.com/upma
Huddling around my laptop because it's the only warm thing in this house.
Just boarded the plane. Sitting right next to the toilet. 6 hours of the smell of ass. This should be fun.....
Wait. When the hell did it start costing $15 to check a bag!?!? I could have shipped the damn thing for less.
Leaving for the east coast and just in time too. Power went out in the apartment.
Back at the pixel mines.
